CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: teseum
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This teseum coated projectile offers more penetration without compromizing damage potential. Can only be fired from teseum reinforced guns.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: teseum arrow
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The arrow head is made from teseum.
